movie_title: What makes Thomas Jefferson so controversial? - Frank Cogliano
introduction: Thomas Jefferson was a founding father of the United States — but were his principles outweighed by
lead_intro: Join the debate on Thomas Jefferson's legacy as a founding father and his complex relationship with slavery and equality.

quiz.question: What did Jefferson primarily author?
quiz.explanation: Thomas Jefferson was the primary author of the Declaration of Independence.

quiz.question: Which group did Jefferson believe could be equal to whites?
quiz.explanation: Jefferson believed Native Americans could be equal to whites in peacetime.

quiz.question: What did Jefferson do to limit criticism of the government?
quiz.explanation: Jefferson signed legislation that limited criticism of the government during his time as Vice President.

quiz.question: How many enslaved people did Jefferson free in his lifetime?
quiz.explanation: Jefferson freed 10 enslaved people during his life, five during his lifetime and five in his will—all members of the Hemings family.

quiz.question: What did Jefferson do regarding the importation of enslaved people in 1807?
quiz.explanation: Jefferson signed a law forbidding the importation of enslaved people in 1807.
